mapper.update:
update cqj_staff
staffname = #{staffname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staffnub = #{staffnub,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionid = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby1 = #{standby1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby2 = #{standby2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby3 = #{standby3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby4 = #{standby4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standby5 = #{standby5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where staffid = #{staffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cqj_staff set staffname = #{staffname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staffnub = #{staffnub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionid = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby1 = #{standby1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby2 = #{standby2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby3 = #{standby3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby4 = #{standby4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standby5 = #{standby5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where staffid = #{staffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `cqj_staff` WHERE staffid =(SELECT tid FROM `clazzcourseteacher` WHERE clazzid =#{clazzid} AND isMaster=1)
